name: California Penguin
description:
♥ Guide a Fairy Penguin
♥ Through a Spiky, Drone-populated, Asphalted Flatland
♥ Until She Discovers Her California Chill

California Penguin is our first runner!

And our first platformer!

Who knew jumping was this fun?

Made for the Leap Day 2020 Make-a-Level game jam, the theme "incongruous" inspired us to bring penguins to the city. While the current game only has one level, obstacles are randomized for endless play. 

Let us know what you think!—we're considering adding more levels in the future, so wacky ideas are appreciated!

Powered by RPG Maker MV and a plug-in from LTN Games.
